DOC.detailed_description: This prospective randomize control trial compare three method treatment acute DRUJ instability without concomitant distal radius fracture . Upon determination residual DRUJ instability either preoperatively intraoperatively distal radius fracture fixation , patient randomize one three treatment arm study : nonoperative treatment immobilization , percutaneous DRUJ fixation Kirschner wire , open anatomic foveal repair Triangular fibrocartilage complex TFCC ligament suture . Those patient undergo Kirschner wire fixation pin pull clinic set six week postoperatively . Outcomes assess follow visit use subjective objective measure clinical assistant blind treatment type . Physician-based assessment functional outcome assess use Disability Arm , Shoulder Hand ( DASH ) score Mayo Wrist score , well independent assessment DRUJ instability , ROM , grip strength . Patient-based assessment include visual analog pain score well satisfaction questionnaire .
